'''Guardian''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Mobs ===
* {{EntityLink|Guardian}}, an aquatic hostile mob.
* {{EntityLink|Elder Guardian}}, a more powerful guardian which inflicts [[Mining Fatigue|mining fatigue]].
* {{EntityLink|Elder Guardian Ghost}}, an invisible mob in [[Bedrock Edition]] used to render the elder guardian [[particle]]
* {{EntityLink|Warden}}, a mob that spawns in in the [[Deep Dark|deep dark]] and dispite it's name having a similar definition, the warden is not related to guardians
